page.t: Start as a totally random person in the galaxy.
Start as a totally random fighter pilot in the galaxy.
Start as a totally random trader in the galaxy.
Start as a totally random prospector in the galaxy.
Start as a totally random commander in the galaxy.
Start as a totally random merchant in the galaxy.
Start as a totally random miner in the galaxy.
Randomise Name, Character, Ship, Start sector, and reset Known sectors{1001, 120}(colon)
Start as a random pilot in a random S-class, M-class or L-class ship, in a random sector with between 10k to 200k Cr.
Start as a random captain in a random corvette or frigate strike ship, in a random sector with 20k Cr.
Start as a random commander in a random capital ship, in a random sector with 10k Cr.
Start as a random prospector in a random M-class mining ship, in a random sector with 20k Cr.
Start as a random miner in a random L-class mining ship, in a random sector with 10k Cr.
Start as a random trader in a random M-class trading ship, in a random sector with 200k Cr.
Start as a random merchant in a random L-class trading ship, in a random sector with 200k Cr.
(note)Player: Your Character has been randomly chosen and your Name will be randomly generated when the game starts. Manually change them if you wish.
(note)Universe: A Start Sector that is suitable for your Character has been randomly chosen. Manually change it if you wish.
(note)Starting Ship: A Ship has been randomly chosen. Check that its engines, shields, and weapon loadouts are suitable for your planned game.
(note)Faction Relations: Your relationship with one suitable faction has been set. Check that your relationship with other factions are suitable for your planned game.
